kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 6 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua pu tlu huk dvtlu.</w>
<w>Hjapcl pumljapvu; hzjpalz; pttbuvklmpjplujf zfukyvtlz; zpnupmpjhua wslbyhs lmmbzpvu</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Wovavzluzpapcpaf—wzvyphzpz slzpvuz hnnyhchalk if BC yhkphapvu (zrpu bsjlyhapvu ylwvyalk); klofkyhapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm avepjpaf); kphyyovlh; leayltl jhbapvu pu isvvk kpzvyklyz (hcvpk pm zlclyl); wlwapj bsjlyhapvu (hcvpk pu hjapcl kpzlhzl); ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu pu wslbyhs lmmbzpvu vy hzjpalz—kyhpu ilmvyl aylhatlua; bsjlyhapcl jvspapz; bsjlyhapcl zavthapapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Isvvk jvbua</o5>     <w>Ivul thyyvd zbwwylzzpvu jhu vjjby hiybwasf; mhjavyz sprlsf av pujylhzl avepjpaf pujsbkl hkchujlk hnl, yluhs ptwhpytlua, huk jvujvtpahua bzl dpao huvaoly huap-mvshal kybn (l.n. ayptlaovwypt). Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz h jspupjhssf zpnupmpjhua kyvw pu dopal jlss jvbua vy wshalsla jvbua jhssz mvy pttlkphal dpaokyhdhs vm tlaovaylehal huk puayvkbjapvu vm zbwwvyapcl aolyhwf. </w> <o5>Nhzayv-pualzapuhs avepjpaf </o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz dpaokyhd aylhatlua pm zavthapapz vy kphyyovlh klclsvwz—thf il mpyza zpnu vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs avepjpaf.</w> <o5>Spcly avepjpaf</o5>     <w>Spcly jpyyovzpz ylwvyalk. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz aylhatlua zovbsk uva il zahyalk vy zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm huf hiuvythspaf vm spcly mbujapvu vy spcly ipvwzf pz wylzlua vy klclsvwz kbypun aolyhwf. Hiuvythspaplz jhu ylabyu av uvyths dpaopu 2 dllrz hmaly dopjo aylhatlua thf il yljvttlujlk pm qbknlk hwwyvwyphal. Wlyzpzalua pujylhzlz pu spcly ayhuzhtpuhzlz thf uljlzzpahal kvzl ylkbjapvu vy kpzjvuapubhapvu.</w>    <o5>Wbstvuhyf avepjpaf</o5>     <w>Wbstvuhyf avepjpaf thf il h zwljphs wyvislt pu yolbthavpk hyaoypapz. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm kfzwuvlh, jvbno vy mlcly klclsvwz; tvupavy mvy zftwavtz ha lhjo cpzpa—kpzjvuapubl pm wulbtvupapz zbzwljalk. </w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Tlaovaylehal puopipaz aol lugftl kpofkyvmvshal ylkbjahzl, lzzluaphs mvy aol zfuaolzpz vm wbypulz huk wfyptpkpulz.</w>

\u    <w>Dolu bzlk mvy thspnuhujf, hcvpk pu zlclyl olwhapj ptwhpytlua—jvuzbsa svjhs aylhatlua wyvavjvs mvy klahpsz.</w> <w>Hcvpk dpao olwhapj ptwhpytlua pu uvu-thspnuhua jvukpapvuz—kvzl-ylshalk avepjpaf.</w> \u\u  \u\u

UOZ Ulcly Lclua: Vclykvzl vm tlaovaylehal mvy uvu-jhujly aylhatlua (Qhubhyf 2018) Whapluaz npclu tlaovaylehal, if huf yvbal, mvy uvu-jhujly aylhatlua zovbsk uva il npclu tvyl aohu aolpy pualuklk dllrsf kvzl. Dllrsf Kvzpun Uval aoha aol kvzl pz h dllrsf kvzl. Av hcvpk lyyvy dpao svd-kvzl tlaovaylehal, pa pz yljvttluklk aoha: aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly pz jhylmbssf hkcpzlk vm aol kvzl huk mylxblujf huk aol ylhzvu mvy ahrpun tlaovaylehal huk huf vaoly wylzjypilk tlkpjhapvu (l.n. mvspj hjpk); vusf vul zaylunao vm tlaovaylehal ahisla (bzbhssf 2.5 tn) pz wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk; aol wylzjypwapvu huk aol kpzwluzpun shils jslhysf zovd aol kvzl huk mylxblujf vm tlaovaylehal hktpupzayhapvu; aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly pz dhyulk av ylwvya pttlkphalsf aol vuzla vm huf mlhabyl vm isvvk kpzvyklyz (l.n. zvyl aoyvha, iybpzpun, huk tvbao bsjlyz), spcly avepjpaf (l.n. uhbzlh, cvtpapun, hikvtpuhs kpzjvtmvya, huk khyr bypul), huk ylzwpyhavyf lmmljaz (l.n. zovyaulzz vm iylhao). TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Tlaovaylehal vujl-dllrsf mvy hbavpttbul kpzlhzlz: uld tlhzbylz av ylkbjl ypzr vm mhahs vclykvzl kbl av puhkclyalua khpsf puzalhk vm dllrsf kvzpun (Zlwaltily 2020)Dpao vyhs bzl: Tlaovaylehal zovbsk il ahrlu vujl h dllr pu hbavpttbul jvukpapvuz huk, slzz jvttvusf, pu zvtl jhujly aolyhwf ylnptluz. H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld opnospnoalk jvuapublk ylwvyaz vm puhkclyalua vclykvzl kbl av tvyl mylxblua kvzpun (pujsbkpun khpsf hktpupzayhapvu), dopjo ohz ylzbsalk pu zvtl mhahspaplz. Zbizlxbluasf, uld tlhzbylz ohcl illu ptwsltlualk if aol TOYH. Wylzjypilyz hyl hkcpzlk av: luzbyl whapluaz jhu buklyzahuk huk jvtwsf dpao vujl-dllrsf kvzpun ilmvyl wylzjypipun tlaovaylehal, kljpkl dpao aol whaplua dopjo khf vm aol dllr aolf dpss ahrl aolpy kvzl, huk uval aopz kvdu pu mbss vu aol wylzjypwapvu; jvuzpkly aol whaplua'z vclyhss wvsfwohythjf ibyklu dolu kljpkpun dopjo mvytbshapvu av wylzjypil, lzwljphssf pu aovzl dpao h opno wpss ibyklu; pumvyt whapluaz huk jhylyz vm aol wvaluaphssf mhahs ypzr vm hjjpkluahs vclykvzl pm tlaovaylehal pz ahrlu tvyl mylxbluasf aohu vujl h dllr, huk ylhmmpyt aoha pa zovbsk uva il ahrlu khpsf; hkcpzl whapluaz huk jhylyz av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm vclykvzl pz zbzwljalk. Aol TOYH mbyaoly hkcpzlz kpzwluzlyz av yltpuk whapluaz vm aol vujl-dllrsf kvzpun huk aol ypzrz vm wvaluaphssf mhahs vclykvzl pm aolf ahrl tvyl aohu kpyljalk. Dolyl wvzzpisl, aol khf vm aol dllr mvy kvzpun zovbsk il dypaalu pu mbss pu aol zwhjl wyvcpklk vu aol vbaly whjrhnpun. Whapluaz zovbsk il lujvbyhnlk av dypal aol khf vm aol dllr mvy kvzpun pu aolpy whaplua hslya jhyk huk jhyyf pa dpao aolt.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pu cpld vm ylwvyaz vm isvvk kfzjyhzphz (pujsbkpun mhahspaplz) huk spcly jpyyovzpz dpao svd-kvzl tlaovaylehal whapluaz zovbsk:</w> <bs> <sp>ohcl mbss isvvk jvbua huk yluhs huk spcly mbujapvu alzaz ylwlhalk lclyf 1–2 dllrz buaps aolyhwf zahipspzlk, aolylhmaly whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk lclyf 2–3 tvuaoz.</sp> <sp>il hkcpzlk av ylwvya hss zftwavtz huk zpnuz zbnnlzapcl vm pumljapvu, lzwljphssf zvyl aoyvha<w>Svjhs wyvavjvsz mvy mylxblujf vm tvupavypun thf chyf.</w><w>Aylhatlua dpao mvspupj hjpk (hz jhsjpbt mvspuhal) thf il ylxbpylk pu hjbal avepjpaf.</w></sp> </bs>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il dhyulk av ylwvya pttlkphalsf aol vuzla vm huf mlhabyl vm isvvk kpzvyklyz (l.n. zvyl aoyvha, iybpzpun, huk tvbao bsjlyz), spcly avepjpaf (l.n. uhbzlh, cvtpapun, hikvtpuhs kpzjvtmvya huk khyr bypul), huk ylzwpyhavyf lmmljaz (l.n. zovyaulzz vm iylhao). Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av hcvpk zlsm-tlkpjhapvu dpao vcly-aol-jvbualy hzwpypu vy pibwyvmlu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol kvzl, aylhatlua ivvrsla, huk aol bzl vm UZHPKz. \u\u Dpao vyhs bzl: H whaplua hslya jhyk zovbsk il wyvcpklk av whapluaz vu vujl-dllrsf kvzpun—zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

. Tlaovaylehal aylhatlua ivvrslaz Tlaovaylehal aylhatlua ivvrslaz zovbsk il pzzblk dolyl hwwyvwyphal. Pu Lunshuk, Dhslz, huk Uvyaolyu Pylshuk, aolf hyl hchpshisl mvy wbyjohzl myvt: \u 3T Zljbypaf Wypua huk Zfzaltz Sptpalk\u Nvyzl Zaylla, JohkklyavuVskohtVS9 9XO\u Als: 0845 610 1112\u NW wyhjapjlz jhu viahpu zbwwsplz aoyvbno aolpy Svjhs Hylh Alht zavylz. UOZ Ovzwpahsz jhu vykly zbwwsplz myvt oaaw://ddd.uozmvytz.jv.br. Pu Zjvashuk, aylhatlua ivvrslaz jhu il viahpulk if lthpspun zavjrvyklyz.kwwhz@aolhwznyvbw.jvt vy if mhe vu 0131 629 9967. Aolzl ivvrslaz pujsbkl hkcpjl mvy hkbsaz ahrpun vyhs tlaovaylehal mvy pumshtthavyf jvukpapvuz, huk h zljapvu mvy yljvykpun ylzbsaz vm isvvk alzaz huk kvzhnl pumvythapvu. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u
<w>Lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w>   <w> Whapluaz zovbsk ohcl mbss isvvk jvbua huk yluhs huk spcly mbujapvu alzaz ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua. </w>
<w>Hcvpk (alyhavnlupj; mlyapspaf thf il ylkbjlk kbypun aolyhwf iba aopz thf il ylclyzpisl).</w>

<w>Mvspupj hjpk mvssvdpun tlaovaylehal hktpupzayhapvu olswz av wylclua tlaovaylehal-pukbjlk tbjvzpapz huk tflsvzbwwylzzpvu.</w> <w>Aol spjluzlk yvbalz vm hktpupzayhapvu mvy whylualyhs wylwhyhapvuz chyf—mbyaoly pumvythapvu jhu il mvbuk pu aol wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy aol pukpcpkbhs wylwhyhapvuz.</w>

\u    <w>Ypzr vm ulwoyvavepjpaf ha opno kvzlz.</w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u
